variants.Description in input context: R1441C mutation in the ROC domain
G2019S mutation in the kinase domain
I2020T mutation in the kinase domain

Material used.Description: One hundred nanograms of recombinant human Akt1 (His-tagged protein) was incubated with 50 ng of recombinant human LRRK2 (GST-tagged protein consisting of amino acid residues 970-2527; either wildtype, R1441C mutant, G2019S mutant, or I2020T mutant).

Readout description.Result Description: R1441C mutant LRRK2 exhibited significantly weaker kinase activity for Akt1 (Ser473) phosphorylation compared to wild-type LRRK2.
G2019S mutant LRRK2 showed diminished kinase activity toward Akt1 (Ser473), ascribable to impaired Akt1-binding ability.
I2020T mutant LRRK2 exhibited significantly weaker kinase activity for Akt1 (Ser473) phosphorylation compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for phosphorylation activity.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation level of Akt1 (Ser473) comparable to wild-type LRRK2 activity.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation level of Akt1 (Ser473) significantly lower than wild-type LRRK2 activity (p < 0.005).

Material used.Description: Recombinant GST-LRRK2 or GST alone was mixed with the recombinant His-Akt1 and incubated with glutathione agarose beads.

Readout description.Result Description: R1441C mutant LRRK2 showed reduced binding ability to Akt1 compared to wild-type LRRK2.
G2019S mutant LRRK2 exhibited significantly impaired binding ability to Akt1.
I2020T mutant LRRK2 showed reduced binding ability to Akt1 compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type GST-LRRK2 was used as a positive control for binding activity.

Basic negative control.Description: GST alone was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding level of Akt1 to LRRK2 comparable to wild-type LRRK2.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding level of Akt1 to LRRK2 significantly lower than wild-type LRRK2.

Material used.Description: Proteins after in vitro phosphorylation and those in cell lysates from SH-SY5Y cells were subjected to SDS-PAGE and blotted for analysis using specific antibodies.

Readout description.Result Description: R1441C mutant LRRK2 exhibited reduced phosphorylation of Akt1 at Ser473 compared to wild-type LRRK2.
G2019S mutant LRRK2 showed diminished phosphorylation of Akt1 at Ser473.
I2020T mutant LRRK2 exhibited reduced phosphorylation of Akt1 at Ser473 compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for phosphorylation levels.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation level of Akt1 (Ser473) comparable to wild-type LRRK2 activity.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation level of Akt1 (Ser473) significantly lower than wild-type LRRK2 activity (p < 0.005).

Material used.Description: Neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y cells were transfected with LRRK2-specific RNAi for knockdown experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: Specific results for R1441C mutant in knockdown experiments not described in the literature.
Specific results for G2019S mutant in knockdown experiments not described in the literature.
Specific results for I2020T mutant in knockdown experiments not described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: RNAi control was used as a positive control for comparison.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation level of Akt1 (Ser473) comparable to control RNAi cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation level of Akt1 (Ser473) reduced to 51% or lower compared to control RNAi cells.
